title: Bengals, sports returning, Michael Jordan, Alex Smith
itunes:title: Bengals, sports returning, Michael Jordan, Alex Smith
description:
Colin talks about why the Bengals will most likely struggle this season, why sports will return sooner than some want, the Michael Jordan documentary, and why he doesn't want to watch Alex Smith play anymore. Guests include Maurice Jones-Drew, Brandon Marshall, Steve Smith Sr., Michael Lewis, and Ken Rosenthal.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
